snippet.title: Shyftrs Kickstarter_March 18 2022
snippet.description:
Shyftrs is a 2D hand-drawn HacknSlash Metroidvania with a bizarre inter-dimension world begging to be explored and conquered.

Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/shyftrs/shyftrs-2d-hand-drawn-metroidvania
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1899120/Shyftrs/
Website: www.shyftrs.com
